# @ismartify/arkstore - LLM Context Documentation

## é¡¹ç›®æ¦‚è¿°

**é¡¹ç›®åç§°**: @ismartify/arkstore (å‘å¸ƒå: @ismartify/mapstore)
**ç‰ˆæœ¬**: 1.0.2
**ç±»å‹**: TypeScript/JavaScript åº“
**ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½**: åŸºäº arktype + Map å®ç°çš„å¸¦ç±»å‹æ ¡éªŒå’Œå®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®åŠŸèƒ½çš„ KV å­˜å‚¨ç®¡ç†ç±»

## æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§

- ğŸ”’ **ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨**: åŸºäº arktype æä¾›å¼ºç±»å‹æ ¡éªŒ
- ğŸš€ **é«˜æ€§èƒ½**: ä½¿ç”¨ Map ä½œä¸ºåº•å±‚å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œæä¾› O(1) çš„è¯»å†™æ€§èƒ½
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ **å®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®**: æ”¯æŒ defaultValue å®‰å…¨æœºåˆ¶ï¼ŒéªŒè¯å¤±è´¥æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼
- ğŸ“ **çµæ´»é…ç½®**: æ”¯æŒåŠ¨æ€ schema é…ç½®å’ŒéªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
- ğŸ¯ **æ™ºèƒ½æ¨æ–­**: è‡ªåŠ¨æ¨æ–­æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å¹¶ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹åº”çš„ schema
- ğŸ”§ **æ‰©å±•æ€§**: æ”¯æŒæ‰¹é‡å®šä¹‰ã€å¯¹è±¡æ‰å¹³åŒ–ç­‰é«˜çº§åŠŸèƒ½
- ğŸ’¡ **å¼€å‘å‹å¥½**: æä¾›ä¸°å¯Œçš„è°ƒè¯•å’Œç›‘æ§åŠŸèƒ½

## æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡

### æ ¸å¿ƒç±»ç»“æ„

```typescript
export class ISmartifyArkStore {
  #store: Map<string, any> = new Map();        // æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨
  #schemas: Map<string, any> = new Map();      // Schemaå®šä¹‰å­˜å‚¨
  #arktype: any;                               // arktypeå®ä¾‹

  constructor(arktype: any) {
    this.#arktype = arktype;
    this.#store.set("__namespace", "ismartify.arkstore");
  }
}
```

### è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼

1. **Builderæ¨¡å¼**: æ”¯æŒé“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨
2. **Strategyæ¨¡å¼**: æ™ºèƒ½åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°ç±»å‹ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨é€‰æ‹©å¤„ç†ç­–ç•¥
3. **Templateæ¨¡å¼**: ç»Ÿä¸€çš„éªŒè¯å’Œè®¾ç½®æµç¨‹
4. **Facadeæ¨¡å¼**: ç®€åŒ–arktypeçš„ä½¿ç”¨å¤æ‚åº¦

## API è®¾è®¡å“²å­¦

### 1. æ™ºèƒ½åŒ–APIè®¾è®¡
```typescript
// defineæ–¹æ³•æ™ºèƒ½åˆ¤æ–­å‚æ•°ç±»å‹
define(schemaOrKey?: object | string, schema?: object | string): this {
  if (typeof schemaOrKey === "string") {
    // å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‚æ•°ï¼šè°ƒç”¨ defineByKey
    return this.defineByKey(schemaOrKey, schema);
  } else if (schemaOrKey && typeof schemaOrKey === "object") {
    // å¯¹è±¡å‚æ•°ï¼šè°ƒç”¨ defineByObject
    return this.defineByObject(schemaOrKey, schema);
  }
  return this;
}
```

### 2. å®‰å…¨ä¼˜å…ˆè®¾è®¡
```typescript
// ä¸‰å±‚å®‰å…¨æœºåˆ¶
#validateKeyValue(key: string, value: any, defaultValue?: any): any {
  const schema = this.#schemas.get(key);
  if (schema) {
    const result = schema(value);
    if (result && typeof result === 'object' && result.constructor.name === 'ArkErrors') {
      if (defaultValue !== undefined) {
        // éªŒè¯defaultValue
        const defaultResult = schema(defaultValue);
        if (defaultResult && typeof defaultResult === 'object' && defaultResult.constructor.name === 'ArkErrors') {
          throw new Error(`Both value and defaultValue validation failed`);
        }
        return defaultResult;
      }
      throw new Error(`Validation failed for key "${key}"`);
    }
    return result;
  }
  return value; // å®½æ¾æ¨¡å¼
}
```

### 3. ç”¨æˆ·å‹å¥½è®¾è®¡
- æ”¯æŒç‚¹è·¯å¾„è®¿é—®: `user.profile.name`
- è‡ªåŠ¨å¯¹è±¡æ‰å¹³åŒ–
- æ™ºèƒ½ç±»å‹æ¨æ–­
- ä¸°å¯Œçš„è°ƒè¯•ä¿¡æ¯

## æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½å®ç°

### 1. Schemaå®šä¹‰ç³»ç»Ÿ

#### defineByKey - ç²¾ç¡®å®šä¹‰
```typescript
defineByKey(key: string, schema: object | string): this {
  if (!key || !schema) {
    throw new Error('defineByKey requires both key and schema parameters');
  }
  const compiledSchema = this.#arktype(schema);
  this.#schemas.set(key, compiledSchema);
  return this;
}
```

#### defineByObject - æ‰¹é‡å®šä¹‰
```typescript
defineByObject(obj: object, schemaDefinition?: object | string, prefix = ''): this {
  for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(obj)) {
    const fullKey = prefix ? `${prefix}.${key}` : key;
    
    if (value && typeof value === 'object' && !Array.isArray(value)) {
      this.defineByObject(value, schemaDefinition, fullKey);
    } else {
      let finalSchema = schemaDefinition || this.#inferSchemaFromValue(value);
      this.defineByKey(fullKey, finalSchema);
    }
  }
  return this;
}
```

#### æ™ºèƒ½ç±»å‹æ¨æ–­
```typescript
#inferSchemaFromValue(value: any): string {
  if (typeof value === 'string') {
    // é‚®ç®±æ£€æµ‹
    if (value.includes('@') && value.includes('.')) {
      return 'string.email';
    }
    return 'string';
  }
  if (typeof value === 'number') return 'number';
  if (typeof value === 'boolean') return 'boolean';
  if (Array.isArray(value)) {
    if (value.length > 0) {
      const firstItemType = this.#inferSchemaFromValue(value[0]);
      return `${firstItemType}[]`;
    }
    return 'unknown[]';
  }
  return 'unknown';
}
```

### 2. æ•°æ®æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿ

#### å¯¹è±¡æ‰å¹³åŒ–
```typescript
#flattenObject(obj: any, prefix = ""): Record<string, any> {
  const flattened: Record<string, any> = {};
  for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(obj)) {
    const newKey = prefix ? `${prefix}.${key}` : key;
    if (value && typeof value === "object" && !Array.isArray(value)) {
      Object.assign(flattened, this.#flattenObject(value, newKey));
    } else {
      flattened[newKey] = value;
    }
  }
  return flattened;
}
```

#### å®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®æœºåˆ¶
```typescript
set(keyOrObject: string | object, value?: any, defaultValue?: any): this {
  if (typeof keyOrObject === "string") {
    // é”®å€¼å¯¹æ–¹å¼
    const validatedValue = this.#validateKeyValue(keyOrObject, value, defaultValue);
    this.#store.set(keyOrObject, validatedValue);
  } else if (keyOrObject && typeof keyOrObject === "object") {
    // å¯¹è±¡æ–¹å¼ï¼šæ‰å¹³åŒ–åæ‰¹é‡éªŒè¯
    const flattened = this.#flattenObject(keyOrObject);
    const objectDefaultValue = value;

    const validatedEntries: [string, any][] = [];
    for (const [key, val] of Object.entries(flattened)) {
      const validatedValue = this.#validateKeyValue(key, val, objectDefaultValue);
      validatedEntries.push([key, validatedValue]);
    }

    // æ‰€æœ‰éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡åå†å­˜å‚¨
    for (const [key, val] of validatedEntries) {
      this.#store.set(key, val);
    }
  }
  return this;
}
```

## ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯å’Œæ¨¡å¼

### 1. é…ç½®ç®¡ç†åœºæ™¯
```typescript
// åº”ç”¨é…ç½®ç®¡ç†
const configStore = new ISmartifyArkStore(type);

// å®šä¹‰é…ç½®ç»“æ„
const configTemplate = {
  database: {
    host: 'localhost',
    port: 5432,
    ssl: true
  },
  cache: {
    ttl: 3600,
    maxSize: 1000
  },
  api: {
    timeout: 5000,
    retries: 3
  }
};

configStore.defineByObject(configTemplate);

// å®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®é…ç½®
configStore.set('database.host', process.env.DB_HOST, 'localhost');
configStore.set('database.port', parseInt(process.env.DB_PORT), 5432);
```

### 2. ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ç®¡ç†
```typescript
// ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ç®¡ç†
const userStore = new ISmartifyArkStore(type);

// å®šä¹‰ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®ç»“æ„
userStore.defineByKey('user.profile.name', 'string');
userStore.defineByKey('user.profile.email', 'string.email');
userStore.defineByKey('user.profile.age', 'number >= 18');
userStore.defineByKey('user.settings.theme', '"light" | "dark"');
userStore.defineByKey('user.settings.notifications', 'boolean');

// æ‰¹é‡è®¾ç½®ç”¨æˆ·æ•°æ®
userStore.set({
  user: {
    profile: {
      name: 'John Doe',
      email: 'john@example.com',
      age: 25
    },
    settings: {
      theme: 'dark',
      notifications: true
    }
  }
});
```

### 3. åŠ¨æ€è¡¨å•éªŒè¯
```typescript
// åŠ¨æ€è¡¨å•æ•°æ®éªŒè¯
const formStore = new ISmartifyArkStore(type);

// æ ¹æ®è¡¨å•é…ç½®åŠ¨æ€å®šä¹‰éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
const formConfig = {
  username: { type: 'string', required: true },
  email: { type: 'string.email', required: true },
  age: { type: 'number >= 18', required: false },
  role: { type: '"admin" | "user" | "guest"', required: true }
};

// åŠ¨æ€è®¾ç½®éªŒè¯è§„åˆ™
Object.entries(formConfig).forEach(([field, config]) => {
  formStore.defineByKey(field, config.type);
});

// éªŒè¯è¡¨å•æ•°æ®
const formData = {
  username: 'johndoe',
  email: 'john@example.com',
  age: 25,
  role: 'user'
};

// ä½¿ç”¨å®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®ï¼ŒéªŒè¯å¤±è´¥æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼
formStore.set('username', formData.username, 'anonymous');
formStore.set('email', formData.email, 'noreply@example.com');
formStore.set('age', formData.age, 18);
formStore.set('role', formData.role, 'user');
```

## æµ‹è¯•ç­–ç•¥å’Œè´¨é‡ä¿è¯

### æµ‹è¯•æ¶æ„
1. **core.test.ts** - å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯• (241è¡Œ)
   - APIåŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯•
   - è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶æµ‹è¯•
   - é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†æµ‹è¯•

2. **jsonschema.vitest.test.ts** - åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯• (247è¡Œ)
   - JSON Schemaè½¬æ¢åŠŸèƒ½
   - å¤æ‚ç±»å‹å¤„ç†
   - é›†æˆåŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯•

3. **readme-blackbox.test.ts** - é»‘ç›’æµ‹è¯• (493è¡Œ)
   - åŸºäºæ–‡æ¡£çš„ç”¨æˆ·åœºæ™¯æµ‹è¯•
   - æ–°æ‰‹ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯
   - å¸¸è§é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†

### æµ‹è¯•è¦†ç›–çš„å…³é”®åœºæ™¯

#### 1. åŸºç¡€åŠŸèƒ½æµ‹è¯•
```typescript
describe('å®ä¾‹åˆ›å»º', () => {
  it('åº”è¯¥èƒ½å¤Ÿåˆ›å»ºå®ä¾‹', () => {
    expect(store).toBeInstanceOf(ISmartifyArkStore);
  });

  it('åº”è¯¥åŒ…å«æ‰€æœ‰å¿…éœ€çš„æ–¹æ³•', () => {
    const expectedMethods = [
      'defineByKey', 'define', 'defineByObject', 'set', 'get', 
      'has', 'delete', 'clear', 'size', 'keys', 'values', 
      'entries', 'raw', 'exec', 'debug', 'isArkType'
    ];
    
    expectedMethods.forEach(method => {
      expect(typeof store[method]).toBe('function');
    });
  });
});
```

#### 2. å®‰å…¨æœºåˆ¶æµ‹è¯•
```typescript
describe('å®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®æœºåˆ¶', () => {
  it('éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥æ—¶åº”è¯¥ä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤å€¼', () => {
    store.defineByKey('user.email', 'string.email');
    store.set('user.email', 'invalid-email', 'fallback@example.com');
    expect(store.get('user.email')).toBe('fallback@example.com');
  });

  it('defaultValue æœ¬èº«éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥åº”è¯¥æŠ›å‡ºé”™è¯¯', () => {
    expect(() => {
      store.set('user.email', 'invalid', 'also-invalid');
    }).toThrow('Both value and defaultValue validation failed');
  });
});
```

#### 3. å¤æ‚åœºæ™¯æµ‹è¯•
```typescript
describe('å¤æ‚åµŒå¥— Schema', () => {
  it('åº”è¯¥æ”¯æŒå¤æ‚çš„åµŒå¥— schema éªŒè¯', () => {
    const complexSchema = store.createCompositeSchema({
      user: {
        name: 'string',
        email: 'string.email',
        age: 'number >= 18',
        roles: 'string[]',
        'profile?': {
          bio: 'string',
          avatar: 'string',
          social: {
            github: 'string',
            twitter: 'string'
          }
        }
      },
      config: {
        theme: '"light" | "dark"',
        notifications: 'boolean',
        'advanced?': {
          debugMode: 'boolean',
          logLevel: '"info" | "warn" | "error"'
        }
      }
    });
    
    expect(complexSchema.type).toBe('object');
    expect(complexSchema.properties.user).toBeDefined();
    expect(complexSchema.properties.config).toBeDefined();
  });
});
```

#### 4. æ–°æ‰‹é”™è¯¯åœºæ™¯æµ‹è¯•
```typescript
describe('æ–°æ‰‹å¸¸è§é”™è¯¯åœºæ™¯', () => {
  it('åº”è¯¥å…è®¸æ²¡æœ‰ schema æ—¶è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®ï¼ˆå®½æ¾æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰', () => {
    // æ–°æ‰‹å¯èƒ½ä¼šå¿˜è®°å®šä¹‰ schema ç›´æ¥è®¾ç½®æ•°æ®
    store.set('undefined.key', 'some value');
    expect(store.get('undefined.key')).toBe('some value');
  });

  it('åº”è¯¥æ”¯æŒé“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨', () => {
    const result = store
      .defineByKey('chain.test1', 'string')
      .defineByKey('chain.test2', 'number')
      .set('chain.test1', 'value1')
      .set('chain.test2', 42)
      .debug();
    
    expect(result).toBe(store);
  });
});
```

## æ€§èƒ½ç‰¹æ€§

### æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦
- **getæ“ä½œ**: O(1) - ç›´æ¥MapæŸ¥æ‰¾
- **setæ“ä½œ**: O(1) - å•ä¸ªé”®å€¼å¯¹è®¾ç½®
- **hasæ“ä½œ**: O(1) - Map.has()
- **deleteæ“ä½œ**: O(1) - Map.delete()
- **defineByObject**: O(n) - nä¸ºå¯¹è±¡å±æ€§æ•°é‡

### ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦
- **å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´**: O(n) - nä¸ºå­˜å‚¨çš„é”®å€¼å¯¹æ•°é‡
- **Schemaç©ºé—´**: O(m) - mä¸ºå®šä¹‰çš„schemaæ•°é‡
- **å†…å­˜ä¼˜åŒ–**: ä½¿ç”¨Mapè€Œéæ™®é€šå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œé¿å…åŸå‹é“¾æŸ¥æ‰¾

### æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–ç­–ç•¥
1. **æ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œ**: æ”¯æŒå¯¹è±¡æ–¹å¼æ‰¹é‡è®¾ç½®
2. **å»¶è¿ŸéªŒè¯**: åªåœ¨éœ€è¦æ—¶è¿›è¡Œç±»å‹éªŒè¯
3. **ç¼“å­˜æœºåˆ¶**: Schemaç¼–è¯‘åç¼“å­˜å¤ç”¨
4. **å†…å­˜ç®¡ç†**: æä¾›clearæ–¹æ³•é‡Šæ”¾å†…å­˜

## æ‰©å±•èƒ½åŠ›

### JSON Schema æ”¯æŒ
é€šè¿‡ `ISmartifyArkJsonSchema` ç±»æ‰©å±•ï¼š

```typescript
export class ISmartifyArkJsonSchema extends ISmartifyArkStore {
  // è½¬æ¢ä¸ºJSON Schema
  toJSONSchema(key?: string): any;
  
  // åˆ›å»ºå¤åˆSchema
  createCompositeSchema(schemaDefinition: any): any;
  
  // è·å–å®Œæ•´JSON Schemaæ–‡æ¡£
  getFullJSONSchema(title?: string, description?: string): any;
  
  // å¯¼å‡ºJSON Schemaå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
  exportJSONSchema(pretty?: boolean): string;
}
```

### ç±»å‹æ˜ å°„ç³»ç»Ÿ
```typescript
// è‡ªåŠ¨ç±»å‹æ¨æ–­æ˜ å°„
const TYPE_MAPPINGS = {
  'string': { type: 'string' },
  'number': { type: 'number' },
  'boolean': { type: 'boolean' },
  'string.email': { type: 'string', format: 'email' },
  'string[]': { type: 'array', items: { type: 'string' } }
};
```

## æœ€ä½³å®è·µ

### 1. Schemaå®šä¹‰ç­–ç•¥
```typescript
// âœ… æ¨èï¼šä½¿ç”¨ defineByKey ç²¾ç¡®å®šä¹‰
store.defineByKey('user.email', 'string.email');
store.defineByKey('app.config.timeout', 'number');

// âœ… æ¨èï¼šä½¿ç”¨ defineByObject å¿«é€Ÿå»ºç«‹åŸºç¡€ç»“æ„
const template = { user: { name: 'John', age: 30 } };
store.defineByObject(template);

// âŒ é¿å…ï¼šæ²¡æœ‰ schema çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹è®¾ç½®å¤æ‚æ•°æ®
store.set('user.profile.complex', someComplexObject);
```

### 2. å®‰å…¨è®¾ç½®ä½¿ç”¨
```typescript
// âœ… æ¨èï¼šä¸ºå…³é”®å­—æ®µæä¾›åˆç†çš„é»˜è®¤å€¼
store.defineByKey('config.timeout', 'number');
store.set('config.timeout', userInput, 5000);

// âœ… æ¨èï¼šç¡®ä¿ defaultValue ç¬¦åˆ schema è¦æ±‚
store.defineByKey('user.age', 'number');
store.set('user.age', 'invalid', 18);

// âŒ é¿å…ï¼šdefaultValue ä¹Ÿä¸ç¬¦åˆ schema
store.set('user.age', 'invalid', 'also-invalid');
```

### 3. æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–
```typescript
// âœ… æ¨èï¼šæ‰¹é‡æ“ä½œä½¿ç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ–¹å¼
store.set({
  'user.name': 'John',
  'user.email': 'john@example.com',
  'user.age': 30
});

// âŒ é¿å…ï¼šé¢‘ç¹çš„å•ä¸ªè®¾ç½®
store.set('user.name', 'John');
store.set('user.email', 'john@example.com');
store.set('user.age', 30);
```

## ä¾èµ–å’Œç¯å¢ƒ

### æ ¸å¿ƒä¾èµ–
- **arktype**: >=2.0.0 (peerDependency)
- **TypeScript**: æ”¯æŒES6+è¯­æ³•
- **Node.js**: æ”¯æŒES Module

### å¼€å‘ä¾èµ–
- **vitest**: æµ‹è¯•æ¡†æ¶
- **tsup**: æ„å»ºå·¥å…·
- **tsx**: TypeScriptæ‰§è¡Œå™¨

### æ„å»ºé…ç½®
```json
{
  "type": "module",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "types": "dist/index.d.ts",
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "types": "./dist/index.d.ts",
      "import": "./dist/index.js",
      "require": "./dist/index.cjs"
    }
  }
}
```

## å‘å¸ƒå’Œç‰ˆæœ¬ç®¡ç†

### NPMå‘å¸ƒé…ç½®
```json
{
  "scripts": {
    "npm:publish": "npm run ver+ && npm run build && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/ --access public --no-git-checks"
  }
}
```

### ç‰ˆæœ¬ç­–ç•¥
- ä½¿ç”¨è¯­ä¹‰åŒ–ç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶
- å½“å‰ç‰ˆæœ¬: 1.0.2
- å‘å¸ƒåˆ°npmå®˜æ–¹æº
- ä½¿ç”¨ `--access public` å‘å¸ƒä½œç”¨åŸŸåŒ…

## æ€»ç»“

@ismartify/arkstore æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè®¾è®¡ç²¾è‰¯çš„ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨KVå­˜å‚¨åº“ï¼Œå…·æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹æ ¸å¿ƒä»·å€¼ï¼š

1. **ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨**: åŸºäºarktypeæä¾›å¼ºç±»å‹æ ¡éªŒ
2. **ç”¨æˆ·å‹å¥½**: æ™ºèƒ½APIè®¾è®¡ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç§ä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡å¼
3. **å®‰å…¨å¯é **: ä¸‰å±‚å®‰å…¨æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æ•°æ®é”™è¯¯
4. **æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜ç§€**: O(1)æ“ä½œå¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œé«˜æ•ˆçš„å†…å­˜ä½¿ç”¨
5. **æ‰©å±•æ€§å¼º**: æ”¯æŒJSON Schemaå¯¼å‡ºï¼Œä¾¿äºé›†æˆ
